data.name: RPG Maker MZ - MT Tiny Tales Heroes - A New Beginning
data.detailed_description:
Tiny Tales is designed for those who want to create a cutesy yet epic adventure scenario for their game. In TT Heroes: A New Beginning, you will find 8 unique and expertly crafted heroes for your game!

The world has fallen prey to a corrupt order, and only those that band together to fight evil shall prevail! With this pack, you will have all the necessary tools to bring unique heroes to life in your game! Portraits, Side View Battlers, Static Battlers and Map Sprites, all included to start an epic journey!

Features:

- 8 Unique Heroes: Female Fighter, Male Fighter, Archer, Witch, Samurai, Dancer, Thief and Dragon Knight!
- SV Battlers and Static Enemy versions of the heroes
- Beautiful portraits, both in big bust version and faceset version!
- Chars versions of our heroes
- Various convenient resizes (2x and 3x) to fit with different resolutions!
- (Bonus!) 12 Starting Weapons for SV Battlers!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
